document.title: SP646-Farm and Forest Land Preservation With Conservation Easements

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract: This publication is intended to provide basic information on conservation easements for landowners, community leaders, students and other interested individuals. It is not intended, and should not be used, to provide information to guide a particular conservation easement transaction or to substitute for the legal, financial and/or property appraisal planning or assistance that is needed for such transactions.
